title: I'm Back!
author: JGray
text:
Wow, this page was late. Entirely my fault and I apologize. Keith was behind on a page due to some RL stuff. For some reason I was convinced he was behind on THIS page and not the next page. Of course, this page had been sitting in my email box for days...

So, I feel like an idiot.

Florida was hot and sweaty. LEGOLand was awesome and so much fun! The Wizarding World of Harry Potter was beautiful but so crowded I couldn't enjoy it.

What have you been up to?

replies.author: Sario528*Guest*
replies.text: Help a newbie out: the banner at the top says updates are Wednesday  and Friday but you say the page was late today, and today is Tuesday. Are you in a different time zone, or is the banner wrong?

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Look out Theresa - she's closing in on ya!
